item.sculkitems.echo_lighter.tooltip: Used to activate the End Portal.
enchantment.sculkitems.occlusion.desc: Cancels out most vibrations caused by the player.
text.autoconfig.sculkitems.title: Sculk Items Config
text.autoconfig.sculkitems.option.requir: Whether or not the Sculk Lighter is required to light the End Portal
text.autoconfig.sculkitems.option.spawnO: Whether or not the Occlusion Enchantment will spawn in Ancient City chests
text.autoconfig.sculkitems.option.player: Whether or not Sculk Sensors will only detect player footsteps if a Note Block is under it
